evidence: Mr. Gupta: We are pleased to announce that we achieved a 15% increase in revenue this year, which is a significant milestone for us.

actuals.data: Ms. Kumar stated that they reduced operational costs by 8% over the past year.
evidence: Ms. Kumar: Our team successfully reduced operational costs by 8% over the past year, enhancing our overall efficiency.

actuals.data: Mr. Singh reported that customer satisfaction ratings improved by 25% this year.
evidence: Mr. Singh: I'm happy to report that our customer satisfaction ratings have improved by 25% this year, thanks to our dedicated service team.

text:
4

6‘0 ENTERTANING

Q4-FY23/FY23 Key Operational Highlights

• In Q4FY23, the Company delivered a strong revenue growth along with a positive margin on the back of a moderate increase in ad spends in the industry and due to a lower base effect compared to same quarter last year

• However, we believe that the advertising demand will be subdued in Q1 FY24 due to inflation, looming global recession, slow down of funding for new-age advertisers and dampened consumer demand; this coupled with continued investments in B2C initiatives will keep the margins under pressure

The contribution of B2C revenue as a percentage of total revenue has doubled in FY23 vs. FY22

• ShemarooMe

• ShemarooMe Gujarati

Released 14 new titles during the quarter across movies, web series and plays

Released original web series 'Goti Soda S3' which was well received by the audience

Digital world premiere of movies such as ‘Hey Kem Cho London’, 'Hun Iqbal' and 'Hoon Tari Heer’

ShemarooMe platform was launched in Batelco, Zain & STC in Bahrain

YouTube: With 64 mn subscribers, Shemaroo FilmiGaane is the 21st most subscribed channel in the world

• Other Digital Updates: Launched full movie streaming service “Southplex” with du in UAE & “VDO Box” service with Jawwal in Palestine • Broadcasting:

• Both ShemarooTV and Shemaroo Umang have consistently been amongst the top five in the FTA GEC genre (15+ U+R)

Shemaroo GEC channels have a viewership share of over 9% in the overall Hindi GEC genre

o

• Ratings for Shemaroo MarathiBana remained steady during the quarter

• DTH:

Launched a new DTH service 'Telugu Classics' with classic movies, TV shows, biographies and songs on Tata Play in April 2023

evidence: Revenue from Operations increased to INR 5,566 Mn in FY23 from INR 3,814 Mn in FY22, which is a 45.9% increase.

actuals.data: Total Expenses rose to INR 5,093 Mn in FY23 from INR 3,455 Mn in FY22, marking a 47.4% increase.
evidence: Total Expenses rose to INR 5,093 Mn in FY23 from INR 3,455 Mn in FY22, marking a 47.4% increase.

actuals.data: EBITDA was INR 473 Mn in FY23, up from INR 358 Mn in FY22, which is a 31.9% increase.
evidence: EBITDA was INR 473 Mn in FY23, up from INR 358 Mn in FY22, which is a 31.9% increase.

actuals.data: Other Income increased to INR 34 Mn in FY23 from INR 19 Mn in FY22, an 82.1% increase.
evidence: Other Income increased to INR 34 Mn in FY23 from INR 19 Mn in FY22, an 82.1% increase.

evidence: Finance Cost increased by 18.4% to INR 307 Mn in FY23 from INR 259 Mn in FY22.

actuals.data: PAT after adjustments was INR 94 Mn in FY23, compared to INR 53 Mn in FY22, representing a 77.7% increase.
evidence: PAT after adjustments was INR 94 Mn in FY23, compared to INR 53 Mn in FY22, representing a 77.7% increase.

actuals.data: Total Profit including Comprehensive Income (Net of tax) increased to INR 85 Mn in FY23 from INR 50 Mn in FY22, a 69.8% increase.
evidence: Total Profit including Comprehensive Income (Net of tax) increased to INR 85 Mn in FY23 from INR 50 Mn in FY22, a 69.8% increase.

actuals.data: EPS (not annualised) increased to INR 3.45 in FY23 from INR 1.94 in FY22, which is a 77.7% increase.
